paragraphs.text: The governor of Yi is the political administrator of the Earth Kingdom state of Yi. Although his state capital had fallen under siege of bandits following the assassination of Earth Queen Hou-Ting, leaving it in ruins and its people hungry, he initially refused to sign control over to Kuvira; when the situation grew desperate, however, he reluctantly agreed to her terms and pledged his loyalty to her.

paragraphs.body: Not long after, Kuvira arrived in Yi with her ${link_0}, prompting the governor to ask what she was doing there. paragraphs.text: Not long after, Kuvira arrived in Yi with her army, prompting the governor to ask what she was doing there. At her request, he went on board her train to have a private conversation. Despite the imminent risk of collapse and Kuvira emphasizing that it was not a question if the state would fall but when, the governor refused to sign Kuvira's offer in which she would receive access to all of Yi's resources, especially its rich ore supply, in return for complete protection. He ordered her to leave his state and angrily left the train after being intimidated by the army commander.
